name: codelab-tools
description: Tools for authoring and publishing Google Codelabs

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/bazel build npm_dist && unzip -o bazel-bin/npm_dist.zip -d codelab-elements/build
scripts.pub: npm run clean && npm run build && cd bazel-genfiles && unzip npm_dist.zip -d npm_dist && npm publish npm_dist
scripts.demo: cd claat && go build -o bin/claat.exe && cd ..\sample-codelabs && ..\claat\bin\claat.exe export -prefix ../../codelab-elements/build test-all-features.md

author: Google (original), Bit-Blazer (fork maintainer)
